allPosts.title: The Serverless Framework: Notes and Thoughts
allPosts.excerpt: Because the serverless framework is zero configuration by default, ideally it should be easy to set up and deploy. This is only the ideal case, of course, and any developer from an amateur to a professional knows that actually creating a web app and deploying it is full of trial and error.
